Label.text:
━━September 2nd━━
 Fixed a bug that causes Witch Doctor's Maledict to deal burst damage every 0.1 seconds
━━━━━━━━━
 Fixed broodmother egg sack setting hero hp to 1
━━━━━━━━━
 Witchbane removed
━━━━━━━━━
 ━━August 23th━━
 Dazzle Bad Juju functionality changed - now actively reduce the current cooldown of all items/abilities by a % of their current amount every time Dazzle casts a spell. This will let the ultimate stacks with other sources of cooldown reduction in lieu of the 7.30 change
━━━━━━━━━
 Dazzle Bad Juju cooldown reduction upgraded increased to 4% of current cooldown
━━━━━━━━━
 Balanar the Nightstalker Frost boss removed from the game due to popular unpopularity (rework incoming)
━━━━━━━━━
 I understand many are upset with the changes to stacking cooldown reduction Valve introduced in 7.30. Please understand there is no quick way to fix such huge adjustment but nonetheless a fix is being worked on. Cheers
━━━━━━━━━
 ━━August 17th━━
 Fixed Naga Siren encounter crashing game after 7.30 patch
━━━━━━━━━
 Added new 7.30 neutral items
━━━━━━━━━
 Re-added the Aghanim announcer
━━━━━━━━━
 All patreon supporter can now hold +1 max lives regardless of tier
━━━━━━━━━
 ━━August 6th━━
 Gold distribution had been fixed for parties with less than 4 players. Gold rewards should now be similar to pre-Nemestice
━━━━━━━━━
 Bogdugg health reduced by 2000 hp
━━━━━━━━━
 Bandit Captain no longer uses Blink Strike, attack damage reduced by 50, is no longer cc-immune
━━━━━━━━━
 Naga Siren miniboss regen reduced from 25 to 5. Illusion summons less often and their magic resistance reduced by 10%
━━━━━━━━━
 Void Spirit boss is no longer naked
━━━━━━━━━
 ━━August 5th━━
 Dilation Field no longer increases cooldown, only pauses it
━━━━━━━━━
 Dazzle -Never More Blessed- stacks required for Raze reduced from 10 to 3
━━━━━━━━━
 Dazzle -Communal Discharge- now applies double Poison Touch stacks on impact
━━━━━━━━━
 Fixed all Hoodwink related crashes once and for all (hopefully)
━━━━━━━━━
 Hoodwink Acorn Shot can now have autocast enabled to always target the ground
━━━━━━━━━
 Hoodwink -Mouse with a Bow- now reduces Sharpshooter cooldown by a flat 25 seconds instead of refreshing the cooldown
━━━━━━━━━
 Hoodwink -Smelt of Elderberries- damage reduction while channeling Sharpshooter reduced from 100% to 80%
━━━━━━━━━
 Hoodwink Sharpshooter channel time for max damage is now 2.5s instead of 1s
━━━━━━━━━
 Skeleton King health reduced by 1000, no longer has health regen
━━━━━━━━━
 ━━July 31th━━
 Dazzle -Heal of a Deal- now procs Bad Juju debuff, now requires attacking poisoned target for effect to occur
━━━━━━━━━
 Dazzle -Purple Rain- healing increased from 1% to 2%
━━━━━━━━━
 Dazzle -Mass Burial- no longer hexes cc-immune units
━━━━━━━━━
 Dazzle -Hallowed Ground- will no longer be triggered by illusions
━━━━━━━━━
 Balanar's summon movement speed reduced from 320 to 305, silence radius from 185 to 150
━━━━━━━━━
 Balanar now summon only 1 spider per frost blast hit, down from 2
━━━━━━━━━
 Balanar's spider health reduced by 20%
━━━━━━━━━
 ━━July 29th━━
 Dazzle -Chapel of Woe- removed
━━━━━━━━━
 Dazzle -Purple Rain- renamed -Chapel of Woe-
━━━━━━━━━
 New Dazzle Shard -Purple Rain- causes Bad Juju to also buff allies with a restorative mist
━━━━━━━━━
 Dazzle's Poison Touch cooldown changed from 27/24/21/18 to 24/22/20/18
━━━━━━━━━
 Dazzle's Poison Touch max stacks changed from 2 to 1/2/3/4
━━━━━━━━━
 This means max poison damage is now 15/50/105/180 (was previously 15/50/70/90)
━━━━━━━━━
 Dazzle's Shadow Wave heal/damage increased from 80/100/120/140 to 90/110/130/150, minor damage upgrade increased to 25
━━━━━━━━━
 Dazzle's Shallow Wave cooldown rescaled from 60/46/32/18 to 35/30/25/20, minor cooldown upgrade from 12% to 10%
━━━━━━━━━
 Dazzle's Bad Juju CDR from 25/35/45 to 20/30/40
━━━━━━━━━
 Dazzle's Bad Juju CDR talent from 12% to 7%
━━━━━━━━━
 Fixed Dazzle -Hallowed Ground- saving allies globally
━━━━━━━━━
 Fixed Dazzle's Shallow Grave minor upgardes not showing up in Bristleback shop
━━━━━━━━━
 ━━July 29th━━
 Fixed Dazzle always having his shallow grave talent enabled by default
━━━━━━━━━
 Added ability voicelines for Dazzle
━━━━━━━━━
 ━━July 29th━━
 Dazzle has joined the Labyrinth as our newest Pathfinders! Have fun and let me know your thought!
━━━━━━━━━
 Skeleton King's Hellfire Blast no longer deals damage, slow reduced by half
━━━━━━━━━
 Skeleton King's lifesteal reduced to 15%, magic resistance from 25% to 20%
━━━━━━━━━
 ━━July 11th━━
 Fixed gold bag not granting gold immediately upon pickup
━━━━━━━━━
 Fixed gold bag not making the correct sound
━━━━━━━━━
 Gold bag now gives more gold if there are less players in the game
━━━━━━━━━
 Balanar physical armor reduced by 5, magical resistance reduced by 5%
━━━━━━━━━
 Balanar's summons base health reduced to 100, health gain per difficulty reduced from 100 to 50
━━━━━━━━━
 ━━July 5th━━
 Fixed bugs relating to gold bags collection
━━━━━━━━━
 Balanar's summons' health reduced from 330 to 230
━━━━━━━━━
 ━━June 25th━━
 Addition bug fixes for the channeling problem introduced by the the Nemestice update
━━━━━━━━━
 Pudge miniboss magical resistance reduced from 25% to 20%
━━━━━━━━━
 ━━June 24th━━
 Fixed a bug where level selector cannot be channeled
━━━━━━━━━
 Fixed a bug where players could not buy items
━━━━━━━━━
 Hoodwink Sharpshooter now only need to channel 1 seconds for full damage, piercing increased from 4 to 6 captains
━━━━━━━━━
 Fixed a bug with Alchemists and Troll Warlord AIs not reacting if attacked from very far away
━━━━━━━━━
 Reduced the spawn count of tiny roshans in the Roshan encounter
━━━━━━━━━
 Phoenix -Eternal Sunshine- bonus turn speed reduced from 65% to 20%
━━━━━━━━━
 Balanar tick will no longer attempts to chase the furthest away enemy, health reduced by 20
━━━━━━━━━
 ━━June 20th━━
 Fixed a bug where Giants Ring could be purchased
━━━━━━━━━
 Other minor bug fixes
━━━━━━━━━
 ━━May 25th━━
 Time Dilation debuff duration reduced to 5s
━━━━━━━━━
 Balanar movement speed reduced to 260
━━━━━━━━━
 Balanar's summon speed reduced by 15, silence radius reduced by 10, can no longer block players movement
━━━━━━━━━
 Slightly reduce Phoenix abilities cooldown, especially during the earlier levels
━━━━━━━━━
 Fixed enemy Beastmaster's roar cooldown being 5 seconds instead of 8s
━━━━━━━━━
 Fixed Elemental Io attacking heroes even though it should not
━━━━━━━━━
 Temple Guardian boss will no longer heal if there is only one player nearby
━━━━━━━━━
 Players will no longer lose gold if they have been inactive or dead for too long
━━━━━━━━━
 ━━May 18th━━
 Fixed Balanar boss lagging the game with his ult, let me know if it still happens!
━━━━━━━━━
 Increased starting Midas charge for solo player by 1
━━━━━━━━━
 Increased XP Tome count for solo player by 1
━━━━━━━━━
 Enemy beastmasters will no longer roar solo players
━━━━━━━━━
 Tiny Grouchy Dogs hp from 90 to 70hp
━━━━━━━━━
 Enemy Carty bonus armor reduced from 30 to 10
━━━━━━━━━
 ━━May 18th━━
 BKB cooldown reduced by 10s, duration down by 1s
━━━━━━━━━
 Phoenix Supernova egg health increased to 110/130/150%
━━━━━━━━━
 Fixed Void Spirit astral stepping outside of the room and killing himself
━━━━━━━━━
 Enemy Carty now has 30 additional armor to compensate for their Assault Captain being much less tanky
━━━━━━━━━
 Balanar now summons one additional spider per frost blast hit
━━━━━━━━━
 Tiny dogs in Some Grouchy Dogs encounter now have 90hp (up from 40)
━━━━━━━━━
 Fixed enemy Beastmaster not using his roar
━━━━━━━━━
 Naga Siren miniboss now has MKB
━━━━━━━━━
 LC's Press The Attack attack speed bonus rescaled to 60/70/80/90
━━━━━━━━━
 Windranger -Semiautomatic Assault Archery- now fire one less arrow
━━━━━━━━━
 ━━May 17th━━
 Phoenix -Grass Grows, Bird Flies, Sun Shines- improved, units hit by Icarus Dive will always be attacked exactly 3 times. This should keep the damage output more consistent
━━━━━━━━━
 Dire Golem in catapult stage now has 15 less armor, magic resist reduced from 20 to 15%
━━━━━━━━━
 Satanic active lifesteal increased from 40% to 50%
━━━━━━━━━
 Skeleton King portal health reduced by 5%
━━━━━━━━━
 Enemy Phoenixes Icarus Dive length reduced by 400
━━━━━━━━━
 Mage Slayer spell power reduction reduced from 15% to 10%
━━━━━━━━━
 Axe Battle Hunger max stacks reduced by 1, damage increase per level reduced by 3
━━━━━━━━━
 Jakiro's Liquid Fire attack speed reduction upgrade reduced by 5
━━━━━━━━━
 Jakiro -Molten Transfusion- healing down to 150% from 200% damage, no longer increase attack speed
━━━━━━━━━
 Caustic Finale armor reduction reduced from 5% to 1%, bonus damage from 150 to 100
━━━━━━━━━
 Enemy Alchemists now debuff armor on hit
━━━━━━━━━
 Big Roshan now has MKB
━━━━━━━━━
 Fixed Jakiro -Molten Transfusion- leaving permanent particle effects when combined with -Drachen Flammenwerfer-
━━━━━━━━━
 ━━May 16th━━
 Mage Slayer spell power reduction reduced from 35 to 15
━━━━━━━━━
 Satanic active lifesteal reduced to 40%
━━━━━━━━━
 Implemented some ground work for a progression system, your arcane fragment should now carry from game to game. They don't do anything yet though!
━━━━━━━━━
 Hoodwink's Sharpshooter now pierce 4 captains, up from 2
━━━━━━━━━
 Ogre Magi -All That Glitters Is Gold- gold reward for captain increased from 25 to 50
━━━━━━━━━
 Enemy beastmasters can now roar multiple times
━━━━━━━━━
 Balanar Boss's summon health reduced by 150
━━━━━━━━━
 Dark Seer now aggro upon being damaged
━━━━━━━━━
 Fixed enemy Legion Commander thorwing Overwhelming Odds on nearby players
━━━━━━━━━
 Fixed Hoodwink -Aint No Fortunate One- stop working on death
━━━━━━━━━
 Fixed Axe Battle Hunger not stacking to max stacks
━━━━━━━━━
 ━━May 14th━━
 More fixes for Hoodwink crashes, as always let me know if you still encounter any!
━━━━━━━━━
 Mini Luna attack damage reduced by 10, health reduced by 50, magic resistance down by 5%
━━━━━━━━━
 Fixed Legion Commander's bristle shards in the shop not matching actual minor shard values
━━━━━━━━━
 Badland Bandit Captain Blink Strike cooldown increased from 10s to 16s
━━━━━━━━━
 Doom will no longer doom solo players
━━━━━━━━━
 ━━May 14th━━
 Dark Seer's Vacuum damage reduced by 66%, illusion damage increased by 20%
━━━━━━━━━
 Adjusted Legion Commander's various minor upgrade shards
━━━━━━━━━
 Fixed Legion Commander -Dine In Hell- summons blocking enemies pathing
━━━━━━━━━
 Fixed Legion Commander -Dine In Hell- granting 1000+ duel damage if the summons get to eat bonus chickens
━━━━━━━━━
 ━━May 13th━━
 Legion Commander -Dine in Hell- reworked, now summon 3 permanent immortal squids that grant duel damage whenever they kill a unit
━━━━━━━━━
 Windranger's Powershot cast range is now always the same as arrow travel distance
━━━━━━━━━
 Fixed Windranger -Aeolian Forecast- not working with -Semiautomatic Assault Archery-
━━━━━━━━━
 Fixes crashes related to Hoodwink-created trees, let me know if you still encountering any crash with her
━━━━━━━━━
 Another attempted fixed for the 'cannot buy item' issue, as a side effect, players can now has personal stashes
━━━━━━━━━
 ━━May 13th━━
 Emergency Hotfix for an issue where player can spend gold without receiving items
━━━━━━━━━
 ━━May 12th━━
 New Hoodwink shard -Furryan Rejection Mechanism- allows Sharpshooter to fire more projectiles
━━━━━━━━━
 Big thanks to AdmiralBullDoge for the recent exposure! I'm a big fan!
━━━━━━━━━
 Dragon Knight's -Hoard of Babylon- armor bonus increased by 25%
━━━━━━━━━
 Shadowfiend's -Oathbound Revenant- soul cost increased from 5 to 8
━━━━━━━━━
 Juggernaut -Army of the Isle- illusion duration down from 2s to 1.25s
━━━━━━━━━
 Windrunner -Autumm Chill- sleep now affects stun-immune units, duration down to 10 seconds
━━━━━━━━━
 Dragon Knight's Dragon Tail stun duration reduced by 0.5s
━━━━━━━━━
 Frost Walker boss rage threshold reduced to 25%, rage movespeed bonus increased to 150
━━━━━━━━━
 Frost Walker boss will now prefer to attack heroes with low health
━━━━━━━━━
 Frost Walker spiderlings no longer have flying pathing
━━━━━━━━━
 Frost Walker spiderlings are now smaller, has less health, and are summon when player are damaged by frost nova
━━━━━━━━━
 Storegga's physical armor reduced from 55 to 50
━━━━━━━━━
 Attempted fix for the occasional bugs where players cannot buy any more items
━━━━━━━━━
 Fixed Lifestealer's attack range not matching his model size
━━━━━━━━━
 ━━May 11th━━
 Reduce Warlock's golem damage and magical resistance slightly
━━━━━━━━━
 Adjusted Temple Guardian's purification AI behavior
━━━━━━━━━
 ━━May 9th━━
 New Ogre Magi shard -All That Glitters Is Gold-, cause enemies killed by Fireblast to drop bonus gold for Ogre Magi and his team
━━━━━━━━━
 Ogre Magi -That'll Do, Donkey- spawn interval increased to 2s
━━━━━━━━━
 Reworded Ignite ability and minor attack speed upgrade tooltips to better clarify their functionalities
━━━━━━━━━
 Gave the in-game wiki a make-over. Heroes should be easier to find and shard descriptions should no longer be obscured
━━━━━━━━━
 Dawnbreaker -Stairway to Heaven- no longer stuns and grant spell immunity before the channel finish
━━━━━━━━━
 Dawnbreaker -Echoes of The First Light- now has a 50% proc chance. Illusion damage taken reduced from 500% to 400%
━━━━━━━━━
 Blademail modifier will now only appears in Elite rooms. Reflect damage changed to 50%
━━━━━━━━━
 Fixed Dilation Field not being removed by dispells
━━━━━━━━━

━━━━━━━━━

My deepest gratitude to those who supported this mod on Patreon:
